description.value: The secret society member has a few tricks most others do not. They gain two of the following skill feats: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Charming Liar], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Courtly Graces], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Glean Contents], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Hobnobber], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Lengthy Diversion], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Lie To Me], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Quick Coercion], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Streetwise]. If they are at least 2nd level, they can also choose from among the following: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Discreet Inquiry], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Glad-Hand], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Lasting Coercion]. If they are at least 7th level, they can also choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Shameless Request] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Slippery Secrets].
